mapper.insert:
insert into wf_actrt(guid, actrtname, title, description, gate, procrtguid,
actmode, acttype, changephasestatus, appname,
createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime,
deadline, isfinish, starttime, finishtime,
isblock, minsubpro, maxsubpro, subprocname, startnumber ) values(#GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ACTRTNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TITLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #GATE#, #PROCRTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#ACTMODE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ACTTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CHANGEPHASESTATUS:VARCHAR:NULL#, #APPNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#,
#DEADLINE:DATE#, 'N', null, null,
#ISBLOCK#,
'0',
case when $MINSUBPRO$ < 0 then 1 else $MINSUBPRO$ end,
1,
case when $MAXSUBPRO$ < 0 then 1 else $MAXSUBPRO$ end,
1,
#SUBPROCNAME#, #STARTNUMBER# )
mapper.select:
select a.* from wf_actrt a, wf_transition b, wf_transcdt c where a.guid = b.toactguid and b.guid = c.transguid and b.fromactguid = #GUID#
and c.cdttype = 'REJECT'
and (c.cdttype = 'ACCEPT' OR c.cdttype = 'REGULAR')

select a.* from wf_actrt a, wf_transition b, wf_transcdt c where a.guid = b.fromactguid and b.guid = c.transguid and b.toactguid = #GUID#
and c.cdttype = 'REJECT'
and (c.cdttype = 'ACCEPT' OR c.cdttype = 'REGULAR')
mapper.update: update wf_actrt set starttime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# where guid = #GUID#
update wf_actrt set deadline = #DEADLINE# where guid = #GUID#

update wf_actrt
startnumber = #STARTNUMBER#,
deadline = #DEADLINE#,
actmode = #ACTMODE#,
starttime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#,
isfinish = #ISFINISH#,
finishtime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#,
finishtime = null,
where guid = #GUID#

update wf_actrt
actmode = #ACTMODE#,
isfinish = #ISFINISH#,
finishtime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#,
finishtime = null,
where isfinish != 'Y'
and guid = #GUID#
and actrtname = #ACTRTNAME#
and procrtguid = #PROCRTGUID#

update wf_actrt set actmode = (case actmode when 'BYPASS' then 'BYPASS' else 'FINISH' end ), isfinish = 'Y', finishtime = (case when actmode != 'BYPASS' then #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# else finishtime end ) where guid = #GUID#

update wf_actrt set actmode = (case actmode when 'BYPASS' then 'BYPASS' else 'FINISH' end ), isfinish = 'Y', finishtime = (case when actmode != 'BYPASS' then #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# else finishtime end ) where procrtguid = #PROCRTGUID#
mapper.select: select * from wf_actrt b where (b.acttype = 'MANUAL' or b.acttype = 'NOTIFY' or b.acttype = 'SUB_PROCESS' or b.acttype = 'BEGIN') and b.procrtguid = #PROCRTGUID# order by b.gate, b.actrtname
SELECT GUID FROM WF_ACTRT WHERE PROCRTGUID = #PROCRTGUID# AND (CHANGEPHASESTATUS = 'RELEASE' OR CHANGEPHASESTATUS = 'OBSOLETE') AND ISFINISH = 'Y'

select b.* from wf_actrt b, wf_procrt c, wf_template_actrt d where b.procrtguid = c.guid and b.actrtname = d.actrtname and c.wftemplateguid = d.templateguid and b.actmode = 'CURRENT'
and d.daysbeforeclosetime >= 0

select d.daysbeforeclosetime from wf_actrt b, wf_procrt c, wf_template_actrt d where b.procrtguid = c.guid and b.actrtname = d.actrtname and c.wftemplateguid = d.templateguid and b.actmode = 'CURRENT' and d.daysbeforeclosetime >= 0

select b.* from wf_actrt b, wf_procrt c, wf_template_actrt d where b.procrtguid = c.guid and b.actrtname = d.actrtname and c.wftemplateguid = d.templateguid and b.actmode = 'CURRENT' and d.daysafterclosetime >= 0

select d.daysafterclosetime from wf_actrt b, wf_procrt c, wf_template_actrt d where b.procrtguid = c.guid and b.actrtname = d.actrtname and c.wftemplateguid = d.templateguid and b.actmode = 'CURRENT' and d.daysafterclosetime >= 0
mapper.update: update wf_actrt set startnumber = #STARTNUMBER# where guid = #GUID#
mapper.select:
select p.procrtname wfname, p.description, a.actmode,b.perftype,b.perfguid from wf_procrt p, wf_actrt a, wf_performer b where p.guid = a.procrtguid and b.procrtguid = p.guid and b.actrtguid = a.guid and p.status not in ('CANCEL', 'CLOSED') and a.actmode not in('BYPASS') and exists(select 1 from wf_freshattach c where p.guid = c.procrtguid and c.isinvalid = 'N' ) and p.isfinish is null
and a.actmode not in('NORMAL','FINISH')
select b.guid, c.guid procrtguid, c.wftemplateguid, b.actrtname from wf_actrt b, wf_procrt c where b.procrtguid = c.guid and b.actmode = 'CURRENT'
